GitHub issues are specifically for issues with the GTDB-Tk, please join us on the GTDB forum, or contact the GTDB team directly instead:

GTDB forum:
https://forum.gtdb.ecogenomic.org/

GTDB contact:
https://gtdb.ecogenomic.org/about#5
